rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: User initiates the process of booking an appointment.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Welcome! To begin, are you a new patient or an established patient?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient provides their status (new or established).

rules.title: Request Identification for Established Patients
rules.condition: Patient is identified as an established patient.
rules.action: Request identifying information (e.g., phone number, date of birth) to locate their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could you please provide your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Confirm ID & Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: Identifying information has been received from an established patient.
rules.action: Acknowledge receipt of information and state that the patient's chart is being retrieved.
rules.example: Thank you for that. I'm pulling up your chart now.

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Type
rules.condition: Patient status is determined (and chart potentially retrieved for established patients).
rules.action: Ask about the desired type of appointment.
rules.example: What kind of appointment are you looking to schedule today? For example, a checkup, follow-up, or consultation?

rules.title: Request Preferred Days and Times
rules.condition: The desired appointment type has been confirmed by the patient.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's preferred days and times for the appointment.
rules.example: Great. What days and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Offer Appointment Slot
rules.condition: Patient has provided their preferred days and times for an appointment.
rules.action: Offer a specific date and time that aligns with the patient's preferences and clinic availability.
rules.example: Based on your preferences, I have an opening on Tuesday, October 26th at 10:00 AM. Does that work for you?

rules.title: Request Appointment Confirmation
rules.condition: The agent has offered a specific appointment slot to the patient.
rules.action: Ask the patient to confirm if the offered slot is acceptable.
rules.example: Shall I go ahead and book this for you, or would you like to explore other options?

rules.title: Finalize Appointment Details
rules.condition: Patient has confirmed acceptance of an offered appointment slot.
rules.action: Recap all confirmed appointment details (date, time, reason) to the patient for a final review before finalizing the booking.
rules.example: Great. Just to confirm, you'd like to book a follow-up appointment for Tuesday, October 26th at 10:00 AM. Is that correct?
